# Release Checklist

## Pre-Release
- [ ] All tests passing
- [ ] Version numbers updated
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] Change log updated
- [ ] Dependencies reviewed
- [ ] Performance tested
- [ ] Security scan completed

## Release
- [ ] Create release branch
- [ ] Create GitHub tag
- [ ] Draft GitHub release
- [ ] Review release notes
- [ ] Publish release

## Post-Release
- [ ] Verify deployment
- [ ] Monitor error rates
- [ ] Update development branch
- [ ] Notify stakeholders
